pilots.name: Norra Wexley
pilots.caption: Gold Nine
pilots.ability: While you defend, if there is an enemy ship at range 0-1, you may add 1 [Evade] result to your dice results.

pilots.name: Garven Dreis
pilots.caption: Red Leader
pilots.ability: After you spend a focus token, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1-3. That ships gains 1 focus token.
